std_inline.citation:
'''Record of Gustav Bilstein''': "Liste Nr. 1 - List of Czechoslovakians deported to various camps and ghettos in Poland. Includes name, previous permanent address, current place, and notes about transport. The list has the following sections: THERESIENSTADT, Litzmannstadt, Izbica, Warschau, Lubartow, Kamionka bei Lubartow, Cholm bei Lublin, Krakau, verschiedene Orte"
[https://www.ushmm.org/online/hsv/person_view.php?PersonId=4946809 United States Holocaust Memorial Museum (Record)] (accessed 6 May 2021)
Gustav Bilstein.
